text: فَإِمَّا تَثْقَفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَرْبِ فَشَرِّدْ بِهِم مَّنْ خَلْفَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So if you, [O Muhammad], gain dominance over them in war, disperse by [means of] them those behind them that perhaps they will be reminded.
translation.id.indonesian: Jika kamu menemui mereka dalam peperangan, maka cerai beraikanlah orang-orang yang di belakang mereka dengan (menumpas) mereka, supaya mereka mengambil pelajaran.
